GK22bharst_u:1200: svātantryeṇa niraṅkuśaṃ viharaṇaṃ svāntaṃ praśāntaṃ sadā
GK22bharst_u:1201: sthairyaṃ yoga-mahotsave 'pi ca yadi trailokya-rājyena kim // BharSt_3.91 //
GK22bharst_u:1203: śapharī-sphurtenābdhiḥ kṣubdho na khalu jāyate // BharSt_3.92 //
GK22bharst_u:1204: mātar lakṣmi bhajasva kañcid aparaṃ mat-kāṅkṣiṇī mā sma bhūr
GK22bharst_u:1205: bhogeṣu spṛhayālavas tava vaśe kā niḥspṛhāṇām asi /
GK22bharst_u:1207: bhikṣā-vastubhir eva samprati vayaṃ vṛttiṃ samīhāmahe // BharSt_3.93 //
GK22bharst_u:1211: sukhī śāntaḥ śete munir atanu-bhūtir nṛpa iva // BharSt_3.94 //
GK22bharst_u:1216: caṇḍālaḥ kim ayaṃ dvijātir athavā śūdro 'tha kiṃ tāpasaḥ
GK22bharst_u:1217: kiṃ vā tattva-viveka-peśala-matir yogīśvaraḥ ko 'pi kim /
GK22bharst_u:1219: na kruddhāḥ pathi naiva tuṣṭa-manaso yānti svayaṃ yoginaḥ // BharSt_3.96 //
GK22bharst_u:1223: tām anveṣayatāṃ prayānti satataṃ sarvaṃ samāptiṃ guṇāḥ // BharSt_3.97 //
GK22bharst_u:1226: kiṃ tair bhāvyaṃ mama sudivasair yatra te nirviśaṅkāḥ
GK22bharst_u:1227: kaṇḍūyante jaraṭha-hariṇāḥ svāṅgam aṅge madīye // BharSt_3.98 //
GK22bharst_u:1228: jīrṇāḥ kanthā tataḥ kiṃ sitam amala-paṭaṃ paṭṭa-sūtraṃ tataḥ kiṃ
GK22bharst_u:1229: ekā bhāryā tataḥ kiṃ haya-kari-sugaṇair āvṛto vā tataḥ kim /
GK22bharst_u:1230: bhaktaṃ bhuktaṃ tataḥ kiṃ kadaśanam athavā vāsarānte tataḥ kiṃ
GK22bharst_u:1231: vyakta-jyotir na vāntarmathita-bhava-bhayaṃ vaibhavaṃ vā tataḥ kim // BharSt_3.- //
GK22bharst_u:1232: pāṇiḥ pātraṃ pavitraṃ bhramaṇa-parigataṃ bhaikṣyam akṣayyam annaṃ
GK22bharst_u:1233: vistīrṇaṃ vastram āśā-daśakam acapalaṃ talpam asvalpam urvīm /
GK22bharst_u:1237: tal labdhvāsana-vastra-māna-ghaṭane bhoge ratiṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
GK22bharst_u:1238: bhogaḥ ko 'pi sa eka eva paramo nityoditā jṛmbhane
GK22bharst_u:1239: yat-svādād virasā bhavanti visayās trailokya-rājyādayaḥ // BharSt_3.99*1 //
GK22bharst_u:1240: mātar medini tāta māruti sakhe tejaḥ subandho jala
GK22bharst_u:1241: bhrātar vyoma nibaddha eṣa bhavatām antyaḥ praṇāmāñjaliḥ /
GK22bharst_u:1244: śayyā śaila-śilā-gṛhaṃ giri-guhā vastraṃ taruṇāṃ tvacaḥ
GK22bharst_u:1245: sāraṅgāḥ suhṛdo nanu kṣiti-ruhāṃ vṛttiḥ phalaiḥ komalaiḥ /
GK22bharst_u:1246: yesāṃ nirjharam ambu-pānam ucitaṃ ratyai tu vidyāṅganā
GK22bharst_u:1247: manye te parameśvarāḥ śirasi yari baddho na sevāñjaliḥ // BharSt_3.100*1 //
GK22bharst_u:1248: dhairyaṃ yasya pitā kṣamā ca jananī śāntiś ciraṃ gehinī
GK22bharst_u:1249: satyaṃ mitram idaṃ dayā ca bhaginī bhrātā manaḥ-saṃyamaḥ /
GK22bharst_u:1250: śayyā bhūmi-talaṃ diśo 'pi vasanaṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ bhojanaṃ
GK22bharst_u:1251: hy ete yasya kuṭumbino vada sakhe kasmād bhayaṃ yoginaḥ // BharSt_3.100*2 //
GK22bharst_u:1252: aho vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā
GK22bharst_u:1253: maṇau vā loṣṭhe vā kusuma-śayane vā dṛṣadi vā /
GK22bharst_u:1254: tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama sama-dṛśo yānti divasāḥ
GK22bharst_u:1255: kvacit puṇyāraṇye śiva śiva śiveti pralapataḥ // BharSt_3.100*3 //
